title: William Murchison
text:
William Murchison is a nationally syndicated political columnist in the United States. Murchison is normally of a <a href="conservatism">conservative</a> political persuasion. He is also a regular contributor to <a href="Watchdog.org">Watchdog.org</a>, "<a href="Chronicles%20%28magazine%29">Chronicles</a>" and "The Lone Star Report".
Education.
Murchison obtained his degree from <a href="Stanford%20University">Stanford University</a> and the <a href="University%20of%20Texas">University of Texas</a>.
Career.
Prior to retiring in 2001, he worked as an editor for "<a href="The%20Dallas%20Morning%20News">The Dallas Morning News</a>". Murchison has contributed to a number of national publications which include: the "<a href="Wall%20Street%20Journal">Wall Street Journal</a>", "National Review", "<a href="The%20Weekly%20Standard">The Weekly Standard</a>", and "First Things". He also frequently speaks across the country at colleges and many other forums. He also served, for five years, as a Radford Distinguished Professor of Journalism at <a href="Baylor%20University">Baylor University</a>.
Books.
He is the author of several books including:
Organizations.
He is in addition a member of the <a href="Philadelphia%20Society">Philadelphia Society</a>.
